children.label: Upload your finalised and approved documents here
Applicants should have demonstrated that they represent 25% of UK producers and have the support of at least a further 25%.
Draft requires review and applicant has been informed
QA review of draft application completed
Draft is sufficient to proceed and applicant has been informed
Draft meets pre-requisite requirements to trigger an investigation

Time allocated: 10 days 
The case status will update when you have informed the Exporters government.
Upload copies of documents or links to information that have been used in your assessment of the case
Contact details for interested parties identified
Upload your finalised and approved documents here
The system will use information from this page to auto-populate the public file page for this case. It must be completed prior making the initiation decision.
Finalised tariff classification codes (enter one 10 digit code per line):
The finalised information on this page has been approved for publication.
Add any justification documents and finalised commodity code lists here.

Updates the case status
In exceptional cases you may decide to terminate an application at this point by completing the Case termination tasks in the Close case section.
Upload any documents to support your decision to initiate or terminate this investigation

Time allocated: 1 day
Complete this checklist on the same day that the initiation notice is published. Ensure the Registration / pre-sampling questionnaire and letter of authority templates are uploaded to the system.
The completion of these tasks enables interested parties to choose this case to Register interest in.
The case status will update to customers and the public file will become available.
The timer for the 15 day registration window will start.
Registration of interest documents issued to case
Upload your finalised and approved documents here

Time allocated: 21 days 
The case status updates to questionnaires issued on completion of this task list.
You will have set the due dates for the questionnaires for each party as you send them
Sample notification issued to case record
Triggered by issue of producer questionnaires
Upload your finalised and approved documents here
Non-confidential questionnaires issued to case record - producers
Non-confidential questionnaires issued to case record - importers
Non-confidential questionnaires issued to case record - exporters
Non-confidential questionnaires issued to case record - economic interest
Upload your finalised and approved documents here
Verification visit plan and tracker created

Time allocated: 10 days 
Case status updates to Verification complete
Injury / causation assessment updated with verified data
Economic interest assessments updated with verified data
Causation and non-attribution analysis updated with verified data
Non-confidential verification reports issued to the public file

Time allocated: 1 day 
Case status updates for interested parties
On completion of these tasks :
Interested parties have 14 days to request a hearing 
Interested parties can submit responses to the provisional determination
Governments of exporting countries notified of provisional determination

Time allocated: 1 day 
Interested parties have 30 days to request a reconsideration
Final determination and SoS decision published

Allocated time: 25 days from receipt of a reconsideration request.
If no reconsideration request is received then after 30 days you can make the decision to proceed straight to case close tasks

Only to be used if a case will not be initiated
Completion of these tasks will archive the case for investigators and the applicant.

To be used after final determination or reconsideration.
Completion of these tasks will archive the case for investigators and interested parties.
Do not use this task list if there is an appeal.
All necessary files saved to case
Enter the earliest date of expiry for measures resulting from this case. The system will use this date to display reminders and to determine review availability for interested parties.
Enter the latest date of expiry for measures resulting from this case. If all measures expire at the same time, enter the same date as above.
Undertakings have been accepted as part of the determinations for this case
